reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the Teenager on the Go: 5 Stars for this Belt Bag!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this belt bag as a gift for my teenage sister, and she absolutely loves it! It's the perfect size for carrying all her essentials, like her phone, keys, wallet, and even a small notebook. The adjustable strap makes it comfortable to wear around her waist or crossbody, and the water-resistant material keeps her belongings safe from the elements. Here's why I love this belt bag:Stylish and practical: The sleek design and vibrant lemon color are perfect for my sister's sense of style. It's small enough to be discreet but large enough to hold everything she needs for a day out.Versatile: Whether she's going to school, hanging out with friends, or traveling, this belt bag is the perfect companion. It's hands-free and convenient, allowing her to focus on what matters most.Durable and comfortable: The high-quality materials ensure the bag will last for years to come. The adjustable strap fits comfortably around her waist or crossbody, and the lightweight design makes it easy to wear all day.Great value for money: This belt bag is incredibly affordable, especially considering its quality and functionality. It's a great gift for any teenager who wants a stylish and practical way to carry their essentials. Overall, I highly recommend this belt bag for any teenager in your life. It's a stylish, practical, and affordable gift that they're sure to love!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I was looking for.
reviews.reviewText: This bag is exactly what I was looking for. I was pleasantly surprised with the quality since it was so affordable.The main zipper runs smoothly and it's thicker than the average zipper, which I love.Inside the main pocket, there are mesh pockets on both sides, great for lip balm, tissues, anything small you'd like to keep separate.There is also an almost hidden zipper on the back as another pocket.The clip and strap are thick, comfortable and easy to adjust.I ordered the black. I'm going to purchase more colors soon.This bag is also regulation size for sporting events.I've been extremely happy with this bag.Lastly, I'd like to add that a friend of mine has the expensive Lululemon brand bag that looks and feels identical to this one. The difference only being the price and the logo on front.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good size and versatile
reviews.reviewText: Women's Fanny Pak, Color: BlueI just received it and it's what I was hoping for. I can't speak to durability or water resistance, but it looks well made. The pack is lightweight nylon with good zippers. It has two pockets and a mesh divider in the larger pocket. The strap is on the wider/heavier end of fanny packs but it's soft & smooth woven and I like that for holding it in place. (As opposed to those with thin straps that slip up into your waist on one side and hang on the other.) I tried it on and it is lightweight while empty. There is plenty of room for phone, glasses, and money/cards. You could even over-fill it making it heavy. To carry more items you might want a crossbody-backpack hybrid. It works equally well around the waist or diagonally across one shoulder. It can fit tight enough so when active it won't fling around or dig into my shoulder like a crossbody bag. The belt & buckle are a plus for me, but the pack might be too heavy or bulky (with items) for long distance runners or too difficult to open the buckle for people with weak hands or fingers.I selected one that I hoped could work both for hiking or dressing nicer and walking around a city; it checked that box. I don't see any reason a man cannot wear it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great bag for anyone on the go
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this pink fanny pack from Amazon and I'm really pleased with my purchase! The color is vibrant and fun, adding a pop of color to any outfit. The quality of the material is impressive, it feels durable and well-made. The size is just right, providing enough space for my essentials without being too bulky. The adjustable strap is a great feature, ensuring a comfortable fit for anyone. I love the convenience of having my hands free while still having all my belongings securely stored. Whether I'm out for a walk, running errands, or attending a concert, this fanny pack has quickly become my go-to accessory. Definitely recommend it for both style and practicality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish, practical and well priced
reviews.reviewText: I saw this little bag written up in an online style section and immediately fell for it because of the rare combination of practicality, style and price. After the brown one arrived and id used it a few days, i noticed that the black one was on sale and ordered it. These bags are a go to for numerous occasions from walking the dog to running errands or going for a walk. it fits everything you need and expands a fair amount if you add a few things along the way. I especially like the "secret" pocket against the body (good for cash or credit card) and the fact that it can be worn several different ways-cross body, around the waist, over the shoulder. I also like that the clasp is close to the bag as it feels more secure than old style waist bags with the clasp in the back.I wish it came in bright red...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel, fits more than you think
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for a solo trip so I didn't have to take a large purse. It was perfect and I've continued to use it as a semi regular purse. It's very sturdy and well made, and fit all the things I needed - phone, wallet, keys, gum and other small personal items. A great cheap alternative to the name brand belt bags.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really like this fanny pack. I use it every time I travel and it's small but fits everything I need. It's comfortable. I lent it to my sister and bought a different brand and hated it. Returned the other one, which by the way was more expensive, and bought another one of these. Buy this one. It's great. It looks good on too, which is saying a lot for a fanny pack.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this bag!! I bought it for a music festival, but I’ll definitely use it for other occasions too. Great quality and easy to clean. It looks small, but fits way more than I expected. It feels like the space never ends and it doesn’t look stuffed. It held a portable fan, a portable charger, my phone, my wallet, and 3 of my friends’ phones without any problems. The picture I added shows the bag with my wallet, the fan, and the portable charger inside.

reviews.reviewTitle: great alternative to more expensive brands
reviews.reviewText: this is perfect, much more economical then the main brand ones and very useful. outside pocket perfect for phone, inside large enough for wallet & miscellaneous items + has small mesh dividers inside for quickly finding what’s in there. very pretty & neutral steel blue colour

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Arrived quickly and used it whilst I was in London for a couple of days . Great bag, similar to Lulu lemon

I love the look, fit and the different pockets outside and in. Keeps its structure and the zipper feels very sturdy. The strap might be a little short if you're wearing a large puffer jacket but otherwise works great! I just put it on under my larger jackets and it works perfectly.

After a few months the back zipper broke. Still using the main zipper well.Brought this bag to Disney. Fit my iPhone and a few other cards. So happy to have a small waist pack that doesn’t weight too much. I am a size 12 and this fit well around my waist. Would be hard to fit anyone larger than me. Did not fit comfortably over my shoulder and across my chest.
